OMNI Hospital Cikarang Mendapat Status Rumah Sakit Kelas B
01 Nov 2019, 17:31 by Andita Rahma, Budi Riza
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pemerintah telah menetapkan Rumah Sakit OMNI Cikarang sebagai rumah sakit kelas B.
"Setelah tiga tahun beroperasi, OMNI Hospitals Cikarang semakin lengkap dengan dokter-dokter spesialis dan subspesialis, serta fasilitas pendukung untuk meningkatkan layanan masyarakat," kata dr. Rudy Susanto, direktur Rumah Sakit OMNI Cikarang, dalam rilis yang diterima Tempo pada Jumat, 1 November 2019.
OMNI Hospitals Cikarang menerima layanan dengan jaminan BPJS Kesehatan, BPJS Ketenagakerjaan, private insurance, corporate insurance dan jaminan perusahaan.
dr. Rudy mengatakan status ini diperoleh sejak 14 Oktober 2019. Dia menjelaskan Peraturan Menteri Kesehatan Republik Indonesia No 30/2019 tentang klasifikasi rumah sakit menjelaskan kriteria rumah sakit umum kelas B.
RS ini selain harus mempunyai fasilitas juga harus didukung oleh kemampuan pelayanan medik dasar seperti penyakit dalam, anak, bedah dan obsteri dan ginekologi.
RS juga harus memiliki pelayanan spesialis penunjang medik seperti patologi klinis dan patologi anatomi, anastesi, rehabilitasi medik, radiologi dan laboratorium.
Rudy mengatakan RS OMNI Hospitals Cikarang memiliki dokter-dokter spesialis dasar, dan spesialis penunjang medis yang mempunyai keahlian dan pengalaman yang baik di bidangnya dan siap memberikan pelayanan terbaik.
"Adapun fasilitas-fasilitas unggulan lain yang dimiliki oleh OMNI Hospitals Cikarang untuk mendukung pelayanan dokter spesialis kami antara lain seperti CT scan 128 slices, endoscopy, C-Arm, serta fasilitas pendukung lainnya seperti treadmill, EKG, X-ray, USG, Bank Darah, IGD 24 jam, farmasi, EEG, medical check up, poli executive, dan fasilitas lainnya," kata dia.
â€œDengan ditetapkannya OMNI Hospitals Cikarang sebagai Rumah Sakit kelas B, kami memiliki layanan unggulan yang lengkap, dokter-dokter ahli dan berpengalaman di bidangnya, serta fasilitas yang modern, kami berharap pasien akan semakin yakin untuk mempercayakan kesehatannya kepada OMNI Hospitals Cikarang," kata Rudy.

OMNI Hospital Cikarang Gets Class B Hospital Status
Nov 01 2019, 17:31 by Andita Rahma, Budi Riza
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The government has designated OMNI Cikarang Hospital as a Class B hospital.
"After three years of operation, OMNI Hospitals Cikarang is more complete with specialist doctors and subspecialists, as well as supporting facilities to improve community services," said Dr. Rudy Susanto, director of the OMNI Cikarang Hospital, in a release Tempo received on Friday, November 1, 2019.
OMNI Hospitals Cikarang receives BPJS Health, BPJS Employment, private insurance, corporate insurance and corporate guarantee services.
dr. Rudy said this status was obtained since October 14, 2019. He explained the Regulation of the Minister of Health of the Republic of Indonesia No 30/2019 on the classification of hospitals explaining the criteria of class B public hospitals.
In addition to having facilities, this hospital must also be supported by the ability of basic medical services such as internal medicine, children, surgery and obstetrics and gynecology.
Hospitals must also have specialist medical support services such as clinical pathology and anatomic pathology, anesthesia, medical rehabilitation, radiology and laboratory.
Rudy said OMNI Hospitals Cikarang Hospital has basic specialist doctors, and medical support specialists who have good expertise and experience in their fields and are ready to provide the best service.
"As for other superior facilities owned by OMNI Hospitals Cikarang to support the services of our specialist doctors, among others, such as CT scan 128 slices, endoscopy, C-Arm, and other supporting facilities such as treadmills, EKGs, X-rays, USGs, Blood Banks "24-hour IGD, pharmacy, EEG, medical check-up, poly executive, and other facilities," he said.
"With the establishment of OMNI Hospitals Cikarang as a Class B Hospital, we have a complete range of superior services, doctors who are experts and experienced in their fields, and modern facilities, we hope patients will be more confident to entrust their health to OMNI Hospitals Cikarang," said Rudy .
